Date: 2024-12-06 13:55
Subject: Honouring UAE National Day, Road Safety Awareness Campaign, The Deal X Dyson Staff Sale, Patyka Skincare Truck, Baccarat's 260th Anniversary, The Max Mara Jacket Circle Pop-up, Lessons from Leading the Leadership Academy & Job Opportun
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/550713/78A570475D62C1B426D1547EE974EBE7/chalhoub-sports-day-17.gif> 	
Last week, we came together to celebrate the UAE's heritage, achievements, and unwavering spirit of unity… to celebrate a nation that stands as an example of innovation, resilience, and togetherness.

As a Group, we take pride in honouring the visionary leadership that has shaped this extraordinary nation. And we are committed, together with our National talents, to strive for excellence and contribute to the bright future of this country.

Watch full video <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXSirTQZvOZIQTNfT%252bvyyEDm0ynwtXxj%252bypE9b91%252bEYdALTqtAlWyaMJGc%252fplcSJDb9CC58FonwpYKdhAyLBVr7zIGFsvo5pRReaByZxqgZa%252b4NYK1lflvD8X0ff0eipzcEgRLkp1VXI4q9954fW8Q8Do2R9%252fBB%252fSIJEgiQIM%252bHhRCr1utVLK5dntPcwjmh8ZbKwskQz%252fdZmSbNHpEPk8pFFOIeZmB4dbNoYxtNMfrEx&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C6e8a3e5e1e7341cbbfb508dd15dc2a5b%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638690757537944665%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=eBAVs1VXVwqRUOysspmeGByYLPylYXIYjE%2FSIChQjr8%3D&reserved=0>

JOIN OUR ROAD SAFETY AWARENESS CAMPAIGN WITH EMIRATES DRIVING INSTITUTE 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/550705/1F1829BD973CB6D7B8A5CDCCEDE3DF07/pexels-ingo-543605.jpg> 	
Be part of our Group's Safe Driving Campaign in collaboration with Emirates Driving Institute!

Sign up to for one of our 8 sessions taking place on December 10th & 11th at our DIP Warehouse between 10 AM to 6 PM.

Sign up now!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/545187/D2B7C565CA630A68BC201F481E7A3E59/nuggets-38.png> 	

THE DEAL X DYSON STAFF SALE IS ALMOST HERE

Stay tuned for all the details on this unmissable sale.

Create an account now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.thedealoutlet.com%252fon%252fdemandware.store%252fSites-TheDealOutlet_AE-Site%252fen_AE%252fLogin-Show%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXSirTQZvOZIQTNfT%252bvyyEDm0ynwtXxj%252bypE9b91%252bEYdALTqtAlWyaMJGc%252fplcSJDb9CC58FonwpYKdhAyLBVr7zIGFsvo5pRReaByZxqgZa%252b4NYK1lflvD8X0ff0eipzcEgRLkp1VXI4q9954fW8Q8Do2R9%252fBB%252fSIJEgiQIM%252bHhRCr1utVLK5dntPcwjmh8ZbKwskQz%252fdZmSbNHpEPk8pFFOIeZmB4dbNoYxtNMfrEx&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C6e8a3e5e1e7341cbbfb508dd15dc2a5b%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638690757538004751%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Fd7i5MnNEnbCdqBZ%2Blxew%2BvXIm8d9xoP3PorEe0LzXI%3D&reserved=0>  and get ahead of the game.

CATCH THE PATYKA SKINCARE TRUCK

Catch the Patyka skincare truck from 7–15 December at Ripe Market, Dubai Ladies Club, and Kite Beach to explore clean beauty, grab exclusive gifts and enjoy a glowing experience! 

You can shop Patyka at FACES and WATSONS.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/550707/7F221A0EED7553F7C6E4E35E85BC41B2/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/544565/09670B863F548DDA23D94C0D1A51E927/nuggets-21.png> 	

BACCARAT X TANAGRA: 260 YEARS OF ARTISTRY AND BRILLIANCE

In honor of Baccarat's 260th anniversary, Tanagra hosted The Alchemist Garden exhibition at Atlantis The Royal, showcasing the beauty of nature and exceptional craftsmanship. The event featured highlights such as the whimsical Bestiary, Marcel Wanders' New Antique collection, and the iconic Zenith Chandelier.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/550710/6F59A99936B7D17D007F0CE40F4E38D3/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-1.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/544531/7A08952C56C6A8722FC7C606A1F87310/nuggets-46.png>

y-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-1.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/544531/7A08952C56C6A8722FC7C606A1F87310/nuggets-46.png> 	

THE MAX MARA JACKET CIRCLE POP-UP IN DIFC, DUBAI

Last week, Max Mara celebrated women and individuality with "The Max Mara Jacket Circle" pop-up, an exclusive installation at DIFC, Dubai.

The immersive experience reflected the brand’s new values campaign, highlighting its principles and showcasing the iconic Olimpia jacket. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/550712/3E0250819134A440B345E33E976CF8AD/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-3.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/545541/415E790A6337802D8EADC4304D6268B1/nuggets-49.png> 	

ONE YEAR IN: LESSONS FROM LEADING THE LEADERSHIP ACADEMY

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/hUTBCwNV_kOnfpslELOicA/550711/0E578725D0BCC4B2D4B856463075B804/1730006415200.jpg> 	
Rawan Albina, Director of our Leadership Academy reflects on a transformative year at the Leadership Academy, sharing insights on growth, resilience, and impactful leadership.

The article highlights the power of adaptability, empathy, and continuous learning in shaping strong leaders who drive meaningful change. Through fostering curiosity and a shared vision, the Leadership Academy inspires leaders to embrace challenges and elevate their teams. 

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.linkedin.com%252fpulse%252fone-year-lessons-from-leading-leadership-academy-rawan-albina-bghqf%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXSirTQZvOZIQTNfT%252bvyyEDm0ynwtXxj%252bypE9b91%252bEYdALTqtAlWyaMJGc%252fplcSJDb9CC58FonwpYKdhAyLBVr7zIGFsvo5pRReaByZxqgZa%252b4NYK1lflvD8X0ff0eipzcEgRLkp1VXI4q9954fW8Q8Do2R9%252fBB%252fSIJEgiQIM%252bHhRCr1utVLK5dntPcwjmh8ZbKwskQz%252fdZmSbNHpEPk8pFFOIeZmB4dbNoYxtNMfrEx&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C6e8a3e5e1e7341cbbfb508dd15dc2a5b%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638690757538018922%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=BiSWho39wjiF%2BMPozvRdDSJl0TvWGcJO%2BtDICp6lBB0%3D&reserved=0>
